entry.title: GMA NEWS COVID-19 Bulletin: The last places on earth without COVID-19

media:group.media:title: GMA NEWS COVID-19 Bulletin: The last places on earth without COVID-19
media:group.media:description:
Despite infecting more than 3 million people around the world, there are still 33 countries and territories that are yet to report a single case of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
